reviewText: My purpose in purchasing this video was to find an interesting way to present the symphony orchestra to my general music classes at school. The preview of the content looked like it might be work, but alas, this video  is very ordinary.  The dinosaurs just walk around on the stage, the lasers  aren't much (my own children said that they were hokey) and I found myself  bored.  There was too little variety in the production and I doubt that I  will use this at school.
